basicInfo.name: Juri
basicInfo.flavor: When the Celestial Council manipulates the law to study the Power of Destruction, Juri faces a grave decision: to adhere to corrupt policy or to uphold justice over the law.

Normal Attack.desc:
2 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 55% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 70% of Magic Attack.

Skill 1.name: Celestial Judgment
Skill 1.desc:
All Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 65% of Magic Attack 2 time(s).
 - 100% chance to inflict Defense Reduction. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 77% of Magic Attack.
 - Increases Effect: Defense Reduction to 29%.

Skill 2.name: Ultimate Verdict
Skill 2.desc:
All Enemies
 - 60% chance to inflict Souldeath. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Deals damage equal to 70% of Magic Attack 2 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 80% of Magic Attack.
 - Increases Chance: Souldeath chance becomes 70%.

Passive.name: Divine Scale
Passive.desc:
Self
 - 25% chance to do a Follow-Up Attack. [Always Active]
 - Grants All Damage Nullification. [Ends After: Taking 2 Hit(s)]
 - Revives with Immortality upon falling in battle. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)] [Once per Battle]
 - Revives with Immortality upon falling in battle. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)] [Once per Battle]
 - 3 Enemies When Doing a Follow-Up
 - Deals damage equal to 40% of Magic Attack plus 7% of the target's Max HP 1 time(s). (HP-based damage limited to 300% of caster's Attack)
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Turns: Immortality duration becomes 3 turn(s).
 - Increases Follow-Up Attack Damage: To 50% of Magic Attack plus 9% of the target's Max HP.
超越2段階達成効果
 - Increases Chance: Follow-Up Attack chance becomes 35%.
超越6段階達成効果
 - Self
 - Adds Effect: Crowd Control Immunity upon gaining Immortality. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_8: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_9: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_10: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_11: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.likes: Law, justice, fairness, alcohol, drinking snacks
profile.story: When the Celestial Council manipulates the law to study the Power of Destruction, Juri faces a grave decision: to adhere to corrupt policy or to uphold justice over the law.

basicInfo.name: Juri
basicInfo.flavor: Juri conducted fair trials in the Celestial Court to safeguard the people from the oppressive, militarized celestial nobility.

2 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 50% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).

 - 100% chance to inflict Defense Reduction. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 60% of Physical Attack.

Skill 2.name: Ultimate Verdict
Skill 2.desc:
All Enemies
 - 50% chance to inflict Souldeath. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Deals damage equal to 62% of Magic Attack 2 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 62% of Physical Attack.

Passive.name: Divine Scale
Passive.desc:
Self
 - 18% chance to do a Follow-Up Attack. [Always Active]
 - Grants All Damage Nullification. [Ends After: Taking 2 Hit(s)]
 - Revives with Immortality upon falling in battle. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)] [Once per Battle]
 - 3 Enemies When Doing a Follow-Up
 - Deals damage equal to 35% of Magic Attack plus 7% of the target's Max HP 1 time(s). (HP-based damage limited to 300% of caster's Attack)

basicInfo.name: Juri
